column.name: organizer_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Organizer where name='${organizer-tough-mudder}'

column.name: location_country_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Country where name='${country-germany}'

column.name: event_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Event where name='${2013-tough-mudder-nordwestdeutschland_name}' and start_date='${2013-tough-mudder-nordwestdeutschland_start_date}'
